title: American Horror Story: Double Feature Episode 4 Teaser Breakdown
author: Reel Talk
comment: Lyme disease is Chekhov's gun and will end up being very important

Regarding the ‘showing’ of good writing by referencing celebrities - could it be that the germ of this series was Ryan wishing for the pill himself? He’s Harry? As a writer, it’s hard to express what’s evocative (I laughed so hard at the Joachin Phoenix scene!), but agree that he should somehow be showing it. I wish this series - which I am really engaged with - were a full 12 episodes so it had room to explore a bit more.

The guy who is losing hair is becoming a Pale and he might be the one at the graveyard. Pales' teeth are filed al the way to the gums, but those who have Lark's teeth only had their teeth filed half way.
There are a LOT of people who think they are talented when they aren't. So I can totally believe talentless people taking the pill, knowing the side effects. They THINK they have talent.

Well, I mean, when Ursula was quoting what “Quentin” had to say to Harry. Pretty much alludes that he himself takes the pills but can’t because he’s newly married and is focusing on that for the time being and then direct whatever Harry writes.
description:
American Horror Story: Double Feature Episode 4 Teaser Breakdown! This could be the best episode yet but lets discuss why!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ReelToRealPro
